```{r, include=F, dependson="setup.R"}
## Exam 1 specific

library(tidyverse)
library(nycflights13)

set.seed(42)

flights <- flights %>% 
  slice_sample(prop=.35)
```


Which of the following could **NOT** have produced the output below?

```{r, echo=F}
flights %>% 
  filter(origin == "JFK") %>%
  count(carrier, origin) %>% 
  arrange(desc(n))

```


A)
```
flights %>% 
  filter(origin == "JFK") %>%
  count(carrier, origin) %>% 
  arrange(desc(n))
```
B)
```
flights %>% 
  filter(origin == "JFK") %>%
  group_by(carrier, origin) %>% 
  summarize(n = n()) %>% 
  ungroup() %>% 
  arrange(desc(n))
```
C) 
```
flights %>% 
  filter(origin == "JFK") %>%
  count(carrier, origin) %>% 
  arrange(desc(n))
```
D) None of the above
